text: Couldn't agree more!

Happy to see this project progress. Highway projects like this means increased mobility and safety, enhanced economic competitiveness regionally, and accelerated interstate commerce. #I57

Today at T&I Committee (@TransportGOP) I asked Sec. Buttigieg why infrastructure funding is so slow to get to projects. Failure to quickly get money to projects often leads to delays which only creates higher costs - something I hear about often from state and local government.

Congrats to Westside Elementary (@cabotsd) on this prestigious award! This speaks to the exemplary staff, teachers, and administrators who are committed to helping their students thrive and creating a positive environment in the classroom. #NBRS2023

Congratulations to my good friend and fellow Arkansan, @rep_stevewomack on this great honor. You have certainly made your mark on this vital committee and this is a well-deserved tribute to your strong leadership and work on behalf of the American people.

Today we remember those who lost their lives in this terrible act of violence as well as those heroes who rushed to save others. However, we also remember the stories of courage, strength, and the power of the American spirit both during and after the attacks. May we never forget

I'm sadden to hear of @SteveScalise's recent diagnosis. However, I am confident that he will face this the way he does with all adversity - with true grit and determination. In the meantime, Stacy and I will be praying for his quick recovery.
I am saddened to hear about the loss of our State Treasurer, Mark Lowery. Stacy and I send our prayers to his family and close friends during this difficult time. #arpx

Today we remember and honor those who have served and paid the ultimate sacrifice. May we never forget that freedom is not free. #MemorialDay

Today marks 1 month since @HouseGOP passed a comprehensive blueprint to address our spending under the leadership of @SpeakerMcCarthy. And yet, Biden still hasn't presented a plan to fix our debt. Americans deserve a real solution to out of control spending. #DebtCeiling

This is a victory for farmers, ranchers & landowners. For decades the EPA has expanded its own authority through the Clean Water Act by re-defining WOTUS to include ditches and puddles, inching closer and closer to regulating land rather than water. #WOTUS

An economy that's strong starts with fixing the holes in our supply chain. Today, @TransportGOP delivered on this promise and passed a package of bills which work to address the way we move goods. I look forward to working with @HouseGOP to get this across the finish line.
China has no place in our transit systems. Period.

The lack of truck parking means truckers have to spend additional time looking for a place to park and often times are forced to park in unsafe areas. I thank @RepBost for his leadership and @TransportGOP for working to push a solution forward. #Trucking

Biden had no issue with negotiating debt ceiling reform in 2011, but now he has abandoned that peacemaker mindset. This is why we need to pass the bill - to force this admin to work with Congress. We need to rein in reckless spending. #DebtCeiling

When I first was elected in 2011 we debated over the debt ceiling. After hours of negotiations, we passed bipartisan reform. VP Biden even said it was an honor to work with @HouseGOP to get this across the finish line. At the time, our debt was $15T. Now, it is $31T. #DebtCeiling
Biden's new WOTUS rule hurts our farmers, ranchers, and landowners. The EPA even failed to give an adequate defense when several of my colleagues and I wrote them a letter back in January. #WOTUS

In Arkansas, Agriculture is our largest industry and 97% of our farms are family-owned. Agriculture isn't just a profession, it's a way of life. Today and everyday we thank our hardworking ag producers for providing the world's safest and most abundant food supply. #agday

Today, @TransportGOP voted to overturn the Biden Administration's new WOTUS rule. This change is a massive landgrab that will expand federal control to ponds, puddles, and even ditches all under the false pretense that it will make our waters cleaner. #WOTUS

Proud to be a co-sponsor of this commonsense legislation. It's no longer 2020, it's time our policies reflect that we are not in a pandemic anymore. Next week, we will continue to deliver on our promise to the American people that it's time to rollback these mandates.

It's time to end the COVID-19 emergency. @POTUS declared the pandemic was over months ago yet we're still living with these draconian mandates and restrictions imposed by the Executive Branch. Enough is enough.

It's deeply troubling that the U.S. military says they have concerns regarding foreign purchases of farmland. All the more reason we need the Sec. of Ag on CFIUS to enhance the review process and have more protections in place, which the PASS Act would create. #USFarmland

As a supporter of the DRIVE Safe Act, it's frustrating to hear that agencies have dragged their feet on implementation and have added provisions that weren't part of the original text. Oversight by @TransportGOP is needed so that we can ensure these programs work effectively.

Reports of entities ultimately controlled by the Chinese Communist Party buying American farmland and agriculture companies validate the need for a more proactive posture on protecting our agriculture sector from foreign threats. #USFarmland
